summary: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of 15th Avenue South, between Holgate Street and State Street, and of Golf Drive, between Judkins Street and Norman Street; providing for the establishing of curb grades of 15th Avenue South and Golf Drive, from Grand Street to Norman Street; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of the above named avenues and drive, and for the making of the necessary slopes for cuts and fills upon the property abutting said streets and avenues, and providing that the entire cost of improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited, in the manner provided by law.
